headers.subject: [tosdr:2683] Mykolab.com disclosure

html:
This disclosure is in relation to the review of Mykolab.com's terms of service and privacy policy by ToS;DR, and indicates that ToS;DR has no bias toward Mykolab.com, of which Georg is the Chief Executive Officer. For transparency, Georg C. F. Greve is a GA member of FSFE, as is Hugo Roy, our project lead. While they are personally related, FSFE and ToS;DR are not affiliated. 


--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Mykolab.com disclosure
text:
This disclosure is in relation to the review of Mykolab.com's terms of 
service and privacy policy by ToS;DR, and indicates that ToS;DR has no bias 
toward Mykolab.com, of which Georg is the Chief Executive Officer. For 
transparency, Georg C. F. Greve is a GA member of FSFE, as is Hugo Roy, our 
project lead. While they are personally related, FSFE and ToS;DR are not 
affiliated. 


-- 
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr
